name: Cold Curve
description:
7DFPS 2014 is coming!  So, this is my work for previous contest. Cold Curve – just a raw prototype. The game is about using your body like projectile, focused on sence of high-speed fallings and smashing stuff.

*

Controls: WASD – move; F (hold & release) – force jump to point (opposite, if lightmark is near); Q - look at your enemy.

Also: LeftShift – run; Space – jump; Esc – exit.

*

Music: "Drop of Water In the Ocean" by Broke For Free

Contact: winesays@gmail.com
